#summary Instructions on how to use NativeLibs4Java from Maven projects
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

NativeLibs4Java has a Maven repository in which new versions of both binaries and sources of its subprojects are regularly uploaded (only OpenCL4Java, for now).

= Repository =

To use [http://nativelibs4java.sourceforge.net/maven NativeLibs4Java's Maven repository], you need to add the following lines to your pom.xml :

{{{
<project ...>
	...
	<repositories>
		<repository>
		  <id>nativelibs4java</id>
		  <uniqueVersion>false</uniqueVersion>
		  <url>http://nativelibs4java.sourceforge.net/maven</url>
		</repository>
		<repository>
		  <id>jnaerator</id>
		  <uniqueVersion>false</uniqueVersion>
		  <url>http://jnaerator.sourceforge.net/maven</url>
		</repository>
	</repositories>
	...
</project>
}}}

= Projects = 

  * [http://nativelibs4java.sourceforge.net/projects/OpenCL4Java/ OpenCL4Java / ScalaCL]
  {{{
<project ...>
	...
	<dependencies>
		...
		<dependency>
			<groupId>com.nativelibs4java</groupId>
			<artifactId>OpenCL4Java</artifactId>
			<version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
			<scope>compile</scope>
		</dependency>
		...
	</dependencies>
	...
</project>
}}}
